Projects.title: Portoblog
desc: Portoblog is a blogging platform that I created to showcase my writing and share my thoughts with the world. The platform is built using Next.js, Typescript, and Payload

The platform has a few features such as user authentication, blog post creation, blog post editing, blog post deletion, and blog post commenting. The platform also has a few other features such as user profile management and blog post search.

Projects.title: MerdekAI - AI Chatbot
desc: MerdekAI is an AI chatbot designed to provide users with accurate and relevant information about any topic they inquire about. The chatbot utilizes advanced natural language processing techniques to understand user queries and provide appropriate responses. Merdekai is capable of handling a wide range of topics, from general.

Projects.title: Ecommerce Static Landing Page
desc: Ecommerce Static Landing Page is a project that I created to showcase my skills in building landing pages. The project is built using Next.js, Typescript, and Tailwind CSS.
The project has a few animations and transitions to make the landing page more interactive.

Projects.title: Coffeeshop Static Landing Page
desc: Coffeeshop Static Landing Page is a project that I created to showcase my skills in building landing pages. The project is built using Next.js, Typescript, Framer Motion, and Tailwind CSS.
The project has a few animations and transitions to make the landing page more interactive.

Projects.title: Dicoding Community Network
desc: DCN Universitas Al-Khairiyah is a community network platform designed to learn and get certifications from Dicoding. This platform is built using Next.js

Projects.title: Dipelajarin Code Editor
desc: Dipelajarin Code Editor is a web-based code editor designed for educational purposes. It allows users to write, edit, and run code snippets in various programming languages.
The editor is built using Next.js and provides a user-friendly interface with syntax highlighting, code completion, and real-time collaboration features.
